languages.text: "Как громко! Зачем же так кричать-то! Ох... Вы что-то говорили, господин дознаватель? Не расслышала вас за этим душераздирающим воплем".

traits.locale_text: "Как громко! Зачем же так кричать-то! Ох... Вы что-то говорили, господин дознаватель? Не расслышала вас за этим душераздирающим воплем".

languages.text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."
languages.original_text: "Как громко! Зачем же так кричать-то! Ох... Вы что-то говорили, господин дознаватель? Не расслышала вас за этим душераздирающим воплем".

traits.locale_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."
"You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."
"You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."
"You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

languages.text: “你的声音太响了！你为什么要像那样大喊大叫？噢……你刚刚说什么了吗，审讯官大人？我耳朵里刚刚灌满了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫，没听到你在说什么。”
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: “你的声音太响了！你为什么要像那样大喊大叫？噢……你刚刚说什么了吗，审讯官大人？我耳朵里刚刚灌满了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫，没听到你在说什么。”

languages.text: «¡Callaos de una vez! ¿Por qué gritáis tanto? Oh... ¿Ha dicho algo, maestro interrogador? No he podido oírle con estos gritos escalofriantes».
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: «¡Callaos de una vez! ¿Por qué gritáis tanto? Oh... ¿Ha dicho algo, maestro interrogador? No he podido oírle con estos gritos escalofriantes».

languages.text: 「うるさい！どうしてそんなに叫んでいるの？ああ…なにか言ったかしら、異端審問官様？ゾットするような叫び声で、何も聞こえなかったの」
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: 「うるさい！どうしてそんなに叫んでいるの？ああ…なにか言ったかしら、異端審問官様？ゾットするような叫び声で、何も聞こえなかったの」

languages.text: "Ihr seid so laut! Warum schreit Ihr so? Oh ... Habt Ihr etwas gesagt, Meister Interrogator? Ich konnte Euch angesichts der markerschütternden Schreie nicht hören."
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid so laut! Warum schreit Ihr so? Oh ... Habt Ihr etwas gesagt, Meister Interrogator? Ich konnte Euch angesichts der markerschütternden Schreie nicht hören."

languages.text: « Mais arrêtez donc ! Pourquoi crier si fort ? Oh... Vous avez dit quelque chose, maître interrogateur ? Avec tous ces hurlements atroces, je n'entends pas grand-chose. »
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: « Mais arrêtez donc ! Pourquoi crier si fort ? Oh... Vous avez dit quelque chose, maître interrogateur ? Avec tous ces hurlements atroces, je n'entends pas grand-chose. »

languages.text: "Çok gürültü yapıyorsunuz! Ne bağırıyorsunuz be? Ha, ne?.. Bir şey mi dedin Üstat Sorgucu? Kan donduran çığlıklardan duyamadım da."
languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."

traits.locale_text: "Çok gürültü yapıyorsunuz! Neden bu kadar bağırıyorsunuz? Ah... Bir şey mi söyledin Üstat Sorgucu? Kan donduran çığlıklardan seni duyamadım."

languages.original_text: "You're being so loud! Why are you shouting like that? Oh... Did you say something, Master Interrogator? I couldn't hear you over the blood-curdling screams."
